input_str:
Mr. Sarkozy, speaking Monday at the Sorbonne, where a daylong symposium on the report was under way just two weeks before the next Group of 20 summit meeting, said he would encourage other countries to examine its findings as well.

“France will put this on the agenda of all of the international meetings and all the discussions that have for an objective the creation of a new order,” he said.

Mr. Sarkozy created the commission in February 2008, only the latest initiative to take on the issue. The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development and the European Commission are also considering new economic measures.

G.D.P. is the measure of the market value of all
